value.title: Copy a Visual as an Image on Clipboard in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will discuss the newly rolled out feature for Power BI Service – Copy visual as an Image.  In this video, we will be discussing the following features: • How to Copy a Visual as an Image for Power BI Report? • The properties and metadata which are copied using Copy a visual as an Image
